snippet: As the questioning of prospective jurors in George Zimmerman’s murder trial resumed, lawyers tried to discern any leanings they may harbor.
abstract: Lawyers try to discern bias as questioning of prospective jurors in George Zimmerman's murder trial resumes.
lead_paragraph: As the questioning of prospective jurors in George Zimmerman’s murder trial resumed, lawyers tried to discern any leanings they may harbor.

headline.seo: Jury Selection Continues in Trayvon Martin Case
headline.main: Jury Selection Continues in Trayvon Martin Case
headline.print_headline: Florida: Slow Progress in Zimmerman Jury Selection
